diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Legal Logic.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    LegalLogic[Legal Logic] --> Field1[Law]
    LegalLogic --> Field2[Philosophy]
    LegalLogic --> Integration[Integration Areas]
    law --> lawSub1[Theory]
    law --> lawSub2[Practice]
    philosophy --> philosophySub1[Theory]
    philosophy --> philosophySub2[Practice]
    Integration --> Methods[Research Methods]
    Integration --> Applications[Applications]
